tool_description: A Jersey-based Todo API example hosted on Heroku.
name: Arik Jersey Todo Example
title: Arik Jersey Todo Example

api_list.name: Subscribe
api_list.description: Subscribe to the done status changes of a todo item.

api_list.name: Get All Items
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://arik-so-arik-mashape-experiment-v1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "arik-so-arik-mashape-experiment-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

print(response.json())
